frontmatter.title: How to Filter AWS Lambda Log Messages for CloudWatch Dashboard Widget
frontmatter.description: If you want see the graph of your Lambda function's specific log messages' count and create a CloudWatch dashboard widget out of it, you can have this setup.

frontmatter.title: My Strategy For Getting My Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer Certification
frontmatter.description: Google's Professional Data Engineer certification exam is said to be difficult. I didn't believe it much until I took the exam myself. Now I also confirm that it's indeed a difficult exam and I don't think it can be achieved without thorough preparation and a solid engineering mindset.

frontmatter.title: Basic NN for the Avito Demand Prediction Competition on Kaggle
frontmatter.description: I wanted to try building a model for the Avito Demand Prediction competition on Kaggle and I came across a few hurdles on the road, which taught me lots of new things. I wasn't after a good score but I just wanted to build a neural network with Keras from end to end and get predictions from it.

frontmatter.title: How to setup your Kaggle environment on Google Colab
frontmatter.description: Not a biggie, but I wanted to share my little Jupyter notebook on my github repo, which you can just copy and have your Kaggle environment quickly set up on Google Colab.
